about.title: About me
about.sent1: I code mainly in JS, I'm in love with Vue.js, Node.js and passionate about CSS!
about.sent2: I'm also familiar with React, Angular, PHP and C and I love learning new technologies.
about.sent3: I built my first website in 2009 and never stoped since then!
about.moreexp: You'll find more details about my experiences on
about.besidetext: I'm also a dancer, specialized in tribal fusion. Dance is my main passion and I love to fuse coding and dancing, by creating usefull apps for dancers.
about.chatinvit: Want to chat about code and/or dance?

whatido.title: What I do
whatido.notonthelist: What you want is not on the list? I'd be happy to work on something new,
whatido.dancenotebook: An app where dancers can note their moves/combos/poses and give them tags and caracteristics to easily find them later
whatido.whatzecount: An app where dancers can find a track fitting their needs. Search by bmp, counts, energy, style, ...

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.contacttext: If you want to work with me or just if you want to chat about something, email me here!
contact.alsomedia: I'm also contactable on social media.
contact.subject: What do you want to talk about?
